article_title: UK Cost Agency Queries Value Of $700,000-A-Year Alexion Drug
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

og.description: An enzyme treatment from Alexion Pharmaceuticals costing 491,992 pounds ($704,630) a year may be worth using in babies with a rare disorder but does not represent good value for all patients, Britain's healthcare cost watchdog said.
